verbose_text: Ionomycin, a calcium ionophore that induces different ADAM proteases, most noticeably ADAM10, also enhanced shedding of CD200, though the strength of the response was generally less than that observed with PMA stimulation [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: calcium ionophore that induces different ADAM proteases, most noticeably ADAM10, also enhanced shedding of CD200
